content: these covers are worked in joined rounds a small button button loop and elastic are added to ensure covers fit snugly covers are designed to fit airpods max brand headphones **finished measurements ** width 3 piece will stretch to fit length 31/2 piece will stretch to fit **gauge ** rnds 1-4 = 31/4 **hooks & notions ** us size d-3 3 25mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle locking stitch marker 5/16 8mm wide elastic cut to length as needed 4 buttons needle & thread **materials ** premier® yarns anti-pilling® everyday® dk 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5 oz/100g 273yds/250m color option 1 mc 1107-58 almond 1 ball cc1 1107-34 alaskan blue 1 ball cc2 1107-67 chartreuse 1 ball color option 2 mc 1107-58 almond 1 ball cc1 1107-42 rosewood 1 ball cc2 1107-56 mustard 1 ball
